title: Update Eyegic logo asset reference globally

requirements.summary: Point BrandLogo to the most recently uploaded Eyegic logo asset under /assets/generated and ensure all header logo placements (desktop + mobile sheet) render it consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: `BrandLogo` no longer references an older/incorrect logo path (currently `/assets/generated/EYEGIC LOGO for ID cards-2.dim_1536x864.png`) and instead references the last uploaded logo file under `/assets/generated/`.
On desktop, the header logo displays the updated logo without broken-image fallback.
On mobile, opening the menu sheet shows the updated logo at the top of the sheet.
There are no other components rendering a different Eyegic logo asset path (all visible logo instances match the last uploaded file).

file_operations.description: Update the `src` to reference the latest uploaded static logo asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_512x256.png` (rendered via `/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_512x256.png`) so all usages of BrandLogo display the correct logo.

Verify the desktop header and mobile menu sheet continue to render the logo exclusively via the shared `BrandLogo` component (no hardcoded logo paths), ensuring both placements show the updated asset consistently.
